title: Sightstone
body: Sooo The last couple of seasons supports actually got some attention, now you choose to actually remove the item sightstone....What did just go wrong in your head? if you want the game to be without vision, then do it completely, ur already ruining with the runes. If ur really that eager to quit ur job, then keep it up.

replies.body:
{{item:3096}} {{item:3069}} {{item:3097}} {{item:3401}} {{item:3098}} {{item:3092}}
Sightstone is still there, it's just connected to a quest line instead of behind 800g.
Almost like sightstone still exists and got cheaper.
